thread.title: BMW has no plans to add option for Android Auto to its cars
thread.title_full: BMW has no plans to add option for Android Auto to its cars

author: noreply@blogger.com (shubham singh)
title: BMW has no plans to add option for Android Auto to its cars
text:
Sitemap BMW has no plans to add option for Android Auto to its cars 
In an interview today with TechCrunch, Dieter May, Senior Vice President of Digital Services and Business Models, revealed that BMW has no current plans to integrate Android Auto into any of its cars. Instead, May prioritizes continued investment in ConnectedDrive , the brand's own platform of connected services. 
Of course, this might all sound slightly hypocritical given that BMW already has several models with an option for Apple's CarPlay, or it may also be taken as a sign that the company may decide to drop support in the future once it feels satisfied with the quality of its own services.
